attributes.title: Phone glitch
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch a lot and I mean a lot and when I opened it it just logged me out I tried this for three days straight still didn’t work just a little heads up don’t download this app

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Every time I open the app, the anonymous pops up with so important information that I am not bothered. But the thing I hate is that this orange 🟠 man keeps popping up and I NEED you to address this glitch. An important note before I leave... Gen Z will never be stopped!

attributes.title: the orange oompa loompa must fall
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it was the worst decisions ever!!👿👿😑🤬 like i opened the app and it created an alarm that squeked into my dresser where my pet brother was eating his rock and i continued to read the app when it realized it was a ritual that sent a ✨curse ✨upon my great uncle's dad's fish's step brother's blow up doll and it exploded💥 and made the earth make a 180🌎🔁. also whenever i got a notification, there was always a cult that came to my roof's slide and left a sacrificed baby👹. don't download

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible made my phone glitch and took forever to download even though I have great WiFi once on the app it continued to glitch for a president that claims to be great he sure don’t know how to make a decent app

attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: This app gives false information and most of the time it doesn’t work right. It is a waste of space and as you can see by all the reviews this app should be taken off the App Store.

i was very disappointed when i opened the app. the app plays a sound at the beginning when opening it and it was probably a calling or somebody because so many birds came out and tried attacking me. thankfully i closed the door on time but when i turned around i noticed that there were now many rats coming out. i would’ve rather been in the rat scene in stranger things than what this app brought. i am upset. 😡

my heart is so tempted by 
lauv✨lauv🥰lauv🤪
BY LOAAF 🌈😎
lauuv🤠

attributes.title: SCAM

attributes.title: Awful!! Do NOT download!!
attributes.review: The news won’t load in on my app and it started to glitch out my whole entire phone. I just got my phone less than a week ago. Now I have to get a new phone because of this app. I REPEAT. Do NOT download!!

attributes.title: Absolutely appalled
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to influence my friends to vote for Trump, but as soon as I downloaded it I got a notification from the app calling me a N*****!! I am absolutely disgusted with Trumps campaign and will 100% be voting for Ghislaine Maxwell because she has absolutely no ties with Trump.

attributes.title: 0 stars
attributes.review: I got this app not that long ago and I got 15 different viruses, I somehow go add pop up on my home screen and my phone almost exploded in my hand because it used so much battery so I would recommend to any one👎🏼
